definitions.li3: variant of 裡|里[li3]; lining; interior; inside; internal; also written 裏|里[li3]; li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m; neighborhood; ancient administrative unit of 25 families; (Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels;
